mapper.select: SELECT b.* ,p.proName AS providername FROM smbms_bill b, smbms_provider p where p.id=b.providerId and b.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE smbms_bill SET billCode = #{billcode} ,productName = #{productname} ,productUnit =#{productunit}, productCount =#{productcount}, totalPrice =#{totalprice} ,isPayment=#{ispayment},providerId=#{providerid} WHERE id=#{id}
